title: What Does the 🧠 Brain Emoji Mean?

steps.title: The 🧠 relates to intelligence.
steps.content: The 🧠 relates to intelligence. The 🧠 is a go-to way to compliment anyone’s cleverness. Whether they’re amazing at trivia, incredibly book smart, or a master of any subject, a 🧠 says you’re impressed with their wits. “You aced your test again?! 💯 You must have a perfect GPA. 🧠” “My sister knows all the Star Trek lore. 🖖🏿 She’s like an encyclopedia. 🧠”

steps.title: A 🧠 is great for any general chats about the mind.
steps.content: A 🧠 is great for any general chats about the mind. It’s easy to have a discussion about the human brain with the 🧠. If you want to chat about mental health, psychology, or even neuroscience⁠—the science of the brain⁠—drop a 🧠. “Mental health is so important! 💪 🧠 Take care of yourself this semester!” “Enrolled in 3 psychology classes. 🧠 📚 Excited to dive into the human mind.”

steps.title: People capture all their thoughts with the 🧠.
steps.content: People capture all their thoughts with the 🧠. Our brains are capable of so much, from deep thoughts to random daydreams. A 🧠 makes it easy to talk about whatever you got stuck on. “Deep shower thoughts…🚿🧠 Has my dog named me?” “Putting all my focus into being positive today! 🧠 ✨”

steps.title: A zombie's favorite food source⁠ is represented by a 🧠.
steps.content: A zombie's favorite food source⁠ is represented by a 🧠. If someone consumes a ton of zombie content, then they're probably bound to serve up a 🧠 with their juicy text. [1] X Research source "Did you check out the new Resident Evil flick? It's to die for. 🧟 🧠" " Left 4 Dead is killing me! This level is crawling with zombies. 🧟‍♀️🧟‍♂️🧟🧠"

steps.title: On TikTok, a 🧠 hints at oral sex.
steps.content: On TikTok, a 🧠 hints at oral sex. Many younger users on platforms like TikTok use the 🧠 to talk about this act in a subtle way. The 🧠 makes sure their message goes under the radar, even if someone looks over their shoulder or sees the post later. [2] X Research source “Hey! This TikTok claims doctors can tell if you’ve given 🧠. 😳” “What do you think about 🧠? Is it a first or second date treat? 🍭”

steps.title: Praise someone’s smarts.
steps.content: Praise someone’s smarts. Give them a serious ego boost and celebrate their intelligence. Point out the subjects they shine in and say you’re amazed by them. “You smoke everyone at Scrabble! 🔤 🧠 It’s not even fair.” “I don’t know anyone else who can explain global trade so well! 🌎 🧠” “Her posts are pure gold. 🪙 They’re all so thoughtful! 🧠”

steps.title: Discuss any topic related to the mind.
steps.content: Discuss any topic related to the mind. Have an honest chat about your mental health⁠—maybe you need to unwind or reset. Also discuss the psychology of others with the 🧠 and describe how the human mind fascinates you. [3] X Research source “I need to take a mental health day to recharge. 🧠 🔋” “I’ve got way too much on my mind. 🌪️ 🧠 Going to put something silly on.” “I listen to ‘true crime’ podcasts because I love forensic psychology. 🕵️‍♀️🧠” “We’re learning about how to restore long-term memory in patients. 👩🏾‍⚕️🧠”

steps.title: Share what you’re concentrating on or curious about.
steps.content: Share what you’re concentrating on or curious about. If you’re swept away by a random thought, use the 🧠 to take everyone else along for the ride. Talk about what distracted you today or kept you up at night and entertain your friends. “Thinking about how I live better than any royal did in the Middle Ages. 🏰 🧠” “I’m curious…can psychic abilities be developed? 🧠 🔮 Thoughts?” “Drowning in Pre Calc homework! 🌊🧠 📚”

steps.title: Chew on the subject of zombies.
steps.content: Chew on the subject of zombies. Give your text some serious flavor by throwing in a 🧠. Talk about horror movies, video games, books, or even just a bad day that's left you feeling like a zombie. "Ate up I Am Legend in one night. Best zombie book ever! 🧟 🧠" "So, the movie wasn't great, but I still liked it. I can't resist zombies. 🧟‍♂️🧠" "Rawrrr! 🧟‍♀️ 🧠 This morning...I'm nonfunctional!"

steps.title: Bring up some “oral” on the down-low.
steps.content: Bring up some “oral” on the down-low. If you don’t want anyone⁠—except those in the “know”⁠—to wise up about how spicy your chat is, cover up your tracks with the 🧠. Anyone who isn’t aware of the 🧠’s secret meaning will think your message is totally innocent. “I really want to practice my 🧠 skills.” “I’m a firm believer in giving and receiving 🧠. Fair’s fair. ⚖️” “I express my love with 🧠. 💕 😏”

steps.title: 🤔 (Thinking Face):
steps.content: 🤔 (Thinking Face): This versatile expression can capture someone who’s thoughtful, confused, or skeptical.

steps.title: 🧐 (Face with Monocle):
steps.content: 🧐 (Face with Monocle): This is similar to the 🤔 (thinking face) emoji and describes a person who is “looking closely” into a matter.

steps.title: 🤯 (Exploding Head):
steps.content: 🤯 (Exploding Head): This emoji typically means someone’s mind is “blown” because they’ve just discovered an incredible new fact or started to see the world in another light. [4] X Research source

steps.title: 🤓 (Nerd Face):
steps.content: 🤓 (Nerd Face): People usually throw in this emoji when they feel really knowledgeable about a certain subject and want to jokingly point out they’re the “expert” on the matter.

steps.title: 🎓 (Graduation Cap):
steps.content: 🎓 (Graduation Cap): This emoji celebrates the fact that someone was smart enough to finish school and earn their diploma.

steps.title: 💭 (Thought Bubble):
steps.content: 💭 (Thought Bubble): The thought bubble 💭 (emoji) can represent any idea, whether it’s seriously profound or totally silly.

steps.title: 💡(Light Bulb):
steps.content: 💡(Light Bulb): A 💡(light bulb) emoji symbolizes that the “light bulb” went off in someone’s head and that they just had a brilliant thought.
👅💦, 👄💦: When the 👅 (tongue) emoji or the 👄 (mouth) emoji is paired with the 💦 (sweat drops) emoji, it’s another way to bring up oral sex—just like the 🧠.
